me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport

Interface SMTPClientConfig

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SMTPClientConfigImpl, SMTPDeliveryAgentConfigImpl, StrictLMTPDeliveryAgentConfig

    public interface SMTPClientConfig
    Configuration which is used to deliver email via SMTP
    Author:
    Norman Maurer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getConnectionTimeout()
      Return the connection timeout (in seconds) for the client
      InetSocketAddress getLocalAddress()
      Return the InetAddress which should get used to bind to or null if no specific should get used
      int getResponseTimeout()
      Return the response timeout (in seconds) for the SMTP Server to send the response

    • Method Detail
